[DQC.US.0156.10074] The filer has reported a value of 0.09 using the extension concept pacb:BusinessAcquisitionProFormaEarningsPerShareBasicAndDiluted. This value should be tagged with separate US GAAP elements for the Basic amount and the diluted amount. This means the same fact needs to be tagged with separate elements. An extension element should not be used to tag this fact.
